content.question: Which of the following conclusions is best supported by the data in the table?

choices.label: Traditional elites introduced complex financial practices.
Financial practices facilitated deeper global economic integration.
Transnational businesses incorporated local merchants into their companies.
Governments sought to stimulate economic activity through lending.

content.answer: Financial practices facilitated deeper global economic integration.
